verbose_text: When expressed on serotonergic neurons, the G i -coupled 5HT1BR acts as an autoreceptor, inhibiting adenylyl cyclase, hyperpolarizing the neuron, and decreasing serotonin release.
evidence: G i -coupled 5HT1BR acts as an autoreceptor, inhibiting adenylyl cyclase, hyperpolarizing the neuron, and decreasing serotonin
